resources.string: Must have at least one habit
Don\'t have an account? Sign up
Already have an account? Sign in

Starting image upload to ImgBB for user: %s
Could not upload image to ImgBB. What would you like to do?

Are you sure you want to sign out?

To schedule precise reminders, you need to enable alarm permissions in settings.

Password must be at least 6 characters
Name must be at least 3 characters
Must be over 10 years old to register
All habits are completed. You cannot uncheck.
This challenge will help you develop positive habits
Add tags to categorize your challenge
Choose who can see your challenge
Other users will be able to see and join your challenge
Only you will be able to see this challenge
Start your journey to better physical fitness.
A challenge to start building habits.
Drink a glass of water upon waking

You already have this challenge in your collection

Improve your physical condition with daily habits

A challenge adapted to your needs
This tag has already been added
You cannot add more than 10 tags
You must add at least 3 habits
You cannot add more than 5 habits
Public challenges cannot have location for privacy

Congratulations! You have completed your %d-day challenge.

onResume: Same date, reloading data normally
